landmarks.name: Taj Mahal
landmarks.description: Ivory-white marble mausoleum on the Yamuna river
landmarks.significance: Built by Shah Jahan for his wife Mumtaz Mahal. UNESCO World Heritage Site.

landmarks.name: Great Pyramid of Giza
landmarks.description: Oldest and largest pyramid in Giza complex
landmarks.significance: Only remaining ancient wonder. Built for Pharaoh Khufu.

landmarks.name: Colosseum
landmarks.description: Largest ancient amphitheater ever built
landmarks.significance: Hosted gladiatorial contests. Icon of Imperial Rome.

landmarks.name: Eiffel Tower
landmarks.description: Wrought-iron lattice tower on Champ de Mars
landmarks.significance: Built for 1889 World's Fair. Most-visited paid monument.

landmarks.name: Great Wall of China
landmarks.description: Series of fortifications across northern China
landmarks.significance: Built to protect Chinese states. Total length: 21,196 km.

landmarks.name: Machu Picchu
landmarks.description: 15th-century Inca citadel in the Andes
landmarks.significance: Most familiar icon of Inca civilization. UNESCO World Heritage.

landmarks.name: Statue of Liberty
landmarks.description: Colossal neoclassical sculpture on Liberty Island
landmarks.significance: Gift from France. Symbol of freedom and democracy.

landmarks.name: Angkor Wat
landmarks.description: Largest religious monument in the world
landmarks.significance: Masterpiece of Khmer architecture. Symbol of Cambodia.

landmarks.name: Petra
landmarks.description: Archaeological city famous for rock-cut architecture
landmarks.significance: Ancient Nabataean capital. One of New 7 Wonders.

landmarks.name: Christ the Redeemer
landmarks.description: Art Deco statue of Jesus on Corcovado mountain
landmarks.significance: Iconic symbol of Christianity and Brazil. One of New 7 Wonders.

landmarks.name: Stonehenge
landmarks.description: Prehistoric monument of standing stones
landmarks.significance: One of most famous prehistoric sites. Possible astronomical observatory.

landmarks.name: Acropolis of Athens
landmarks.description: Ancient citadel containing the Parthenon
landmarks.significance: Symbol of Ancient Greece and Western civilization.

landmarks.name: Sydney Opera House
landmarks.description: Multi-venue performing arts center with sail-like design
landmarks.significance: Masterpiece of 20th-century architecture. Icon of Australia.

landmarks.name: Burj Khalifa
landmarks.description: Tallest building in the world
landmarks.significance: Engineering marvel. Symbol of modern Dubai.

landmarks.name: Sagrada Família
landmarks.description: Unfinished Catholic basilica by Antoni Gaudí
landmarks.significance: Gaudí's masterpiece. UNESCO World Heritage.

landmarks.name: Hagia Sophia
landmarks.description: Former cathedral, later mosque, now mosque again
landmarks.significance: Architectural marvel of Byzantine engineering.

landmarks.name: Mount Rushmore
landmarks.description: Sculpture of four US presidents carved into granite
landmarks.significance: National memorial representing 150 years of American history.

landmarks.name: Notre-Dame de Paris
landmarks.description: Medieval Catholic cathedral on Île de la Cité
landmarks.significance: Masterpiece of Gothic architecture. Under restoration after 2019 fire.

landmarks.name: Chichen Itza
landmarks.description: Pre-Columbian Maya archaeological site
landmarks.significance: One of New 7 Wonders. Features astronomical precision.

landmarks.name: Neuschwanstein Castle
landmarks.description: 19th-century Romanesque Revival palace
landmarks.significance: Inspired Disney's Sleeping Beauty Castle.

landmarks.name: Alhambra
landmarks.description: Palace and fortress complex with Moorish architecture
landmarks.significance: Finest example of Islamic art in Europe.

landmarks.name: Forbidden City
landmarks.description: Chinese imperial palace complex, 980 buildings
landmarks.significance: Largest ancient palatial structure. Home to 24 emperors.

landmarks.name: Palace of Versailles
landmarks.description: Royal château, former principal royal residence
landmarks.significance: Symbol of absolute monarchy. Hall of Mirrors is iconic.

landmarks.name: Golden Gate Bridge
landmarks.description: Suspension bridge spanning Golden Gate strait
landmarks.significance: Engineering masterpiece. International orange color is iconic.

landmarks.name: Leaning Tower of Pisa
landmarks.description: Freestanding bell tower famous for tilt
landmarks.significance: Leans at 3.97 degrees due to soft ground.

landmarks.name: Big Ben
landmarks.description: Clock tower at Palace of Westminster
landmarks.significance: Iconic symbol of London and UK.

landmarks.name: Moscow Kremlin
landmarks.description: Fortified complex, official residence of President
landmarks.significance: Symbol of Russian power. UNESCO World Heritage.

landmarks.name: Arc de Triomphe
landmarks.description: Triumphal arch honoring those who fought for France
landmarks.significance: Center of Place Charles de Gaulle. Tomb of Unknown Soldier beneath.

landmarks.name: Pantheon
landmarks.description: Former Roman temple with unreinforced concrete dome
landmarks.significance: Best-preserved ancient Roman building.

landmarks.name: Blue Mosque
landmarks.description: Historic mosque with blue interior tiles
landmarks.significance: Last great mosque of classical Ottoman architecture.

landmarks.name: St. Basil's Cathedral
landmarks.description: Orthodox church with colorful onion domes
landmarks.significance: Symbol of Russia. Built by Ivan the Terrible.

landmarks.name: Terracotta Army
landmarks.description: 8,000+ terracotta warriors guarding Emperor's tomb
landmarks.significance: Discovered in 1974. UNESCO World Heritage.

landmarks.name: Tower of London
landmarks.description: Historic castle housing Crown Jewels
landmarks.significance: UNESCO World Heritage. Guarded by Yeomen Warders.

landmarks.name: Moai Statues
landmarks.description: Monolithic human figures carved by Rapa Nui people
landmarks.significance: Nearly 1,000 statues. Mystery surrounds their purpose.

landmarks.name: Borobudur
landmarks.description: Largest Buddhist temple in the world
landmarks.significance: UNESCO World Heritage. 2,672 relief panels, 504 Buddha statues.

landmarks.name: Pompeii
landmarks.description: Roman city preserved by Mount Vesuvius eruption
landmarks.significance: Frozen in time. Provides snapshot of Roman life.

landmarks.name: Edinburgh Castle
landmarks.description: Historic fortress atop Castle Rock
landmarks.significance: Home to Scottish Crown Jewels. Symbol of Scotland.

landmarks.name: Potala Palace
landmarks.description: Former winter residence of Dalai Lamas
landmarks.significance: UNESCO World Heritage. Symbol of Tibetan Buddhism.

landmarks.name: Mont-Saint-Michel
landmarks.description: Tidal island with medieval abbey
landmarks.significance: Becomes island at high tide. Pilgrimage site since 8th century.

landmarks.name: Milan Cathedral
landmarks.description: One of largest cathedrals in world
landmarks.significance: Took 600 years to complete. 135 spires, 3,400 statues.

landmarks.name: Atomium
landmarks.description: Building shaped like iron crystal magnified
landmarks.significance: Built for 1958 World's Fair. Symbol of Brussels.

landmarks.name: CN Tower
landmarks.description: Communications and observation tower
landmarks.significance: Tallest free-standing structure in Western Hemisphere.

landmarks.name: Chrysler Building
landmarks.description: Art Deco skyscraper with triangular crown
landmarks.significance: Finest example of Art Deco architecture.

landmarks.name: Grand Canyon
landmarks.description: Steep canyon carved by Colorado River
landmarks.significance: UNESCO World Heritage. 277 miles long.

landmarks.name: Victoria Falls
landmarks.description: One of largest waterfalls in world
landmarks.significance: The Smoke That Thunders. UNESCO World Heritage.

landmarks.name: Mount Fuji
landmarks.description: Tallest peak in Japan
landmarks.significance: Sacred symbol of Japan. UNESCO World Heritage.

landmarks.name: Uluru (Ayers Rock)
landmarks.description: Large sandstone rock formation
landmarks.significance: Sacred to Aboriginal Australians. Changes color at sunset.

landmarks.name: Niagara Falls
landmarks.description: Group of three waterfalls
landmarks.significance: Highest flow rate in North America.

landmarks.name: Santorini
landmarks.description: Volcanic island with white-washed buildings
landmarks.significance: Remains of massive eruption. May have inspired Atlantis.

landmarks.name: Empire State Building
landmarks.description: 102-story Art Deco skyscraper
landmarks.significance: Cultural icon. Was world's tallest for 40 years.

landmarks.name: Westminster Abbey
landmarks.description: Gothic abbey, coronation site of monarchs
landmarks.significance: Burial site of monarchs and famous Britons.

landmarks.name: Kaaba (Mecca)
landmarks.description: Holiest site in Islam, direction of prayer
landmarks.significance: Destination of Hajj pilgrimage.

landmarks.name: Kinkaku-ji (Golden Pavilion)
landmarks.description: Zen Buddhist temple covered in gold leaf
landmarks.significance: UNESCO World Heritage. Symbol of Kyoto.

landmarks.name: The White House
landmarks.description: Official residence of US President
landmarks.significance: Symbol of US presidency. 132 rooms.

landmarks.name: Brooklyn Bridge
landmarks.description: Hybrid suspension bridge
landmarks.significance: First steel-wire suspension bridge. Icon of New York.

landmarks.name: Space Needle
landmarks.description: Observation tower with saucer-shaped top
landmarks.significance: Built for 1962 World's Fair. Symbol of Seattle.

landmarks.name: Luxor Temple
landmarks.description: Ancient Egyptian temple complex
landmarks.significance: Center of Opet Festival. Avenue of Sphinxes.

landmarks.name: Karnak Temple
landmarks.description: Vast mix of temples and buildings
landmarks.significance: Second-largest ancient religious site.

landmarks.name: Abu Simbel Temples
landmarks.description: Two massive rock-cut temples
landmarks.significance: Four colossal statues of Ramesses II. Relocated in 1960s.

landmarks.name: Temple of Heaven
landmarks.description: Imperial complex where emperors prayed for harvests
landmarks.significance: Perfect example of Ming architecture.

landmarks.name: Bran Castle
landmarks.description: Medieval castle in Transylvania
landmarks.significance: Known as 'Dracula's Castle'.

landmarks.name: Hollywood Sign
landmarks.description: Landmark sign on Mount Lee
landmarks.significance: Cultural icon representing film industry.

landmarks.name: St. Peter's Basilica
landmarks.description: Largest church building by interior area
landmarks.significance: Built over tomb of St. Peter. Michelangelo designed dome.

landmarks.name: Sistine Chapel
landmarks.description: Chapel famous for Michelangelo's ceiling
landmarks.significance: 'Creation of Adam' ceiling. Papal conclave held here.

landmarks.name: Louvre Museum
landmarks.description: World's largest art museum
landmarks.significance: Houses Mona Lisa. Glass pyramid entrance is iconic.

landmarks.name: Hermitage Museum
landmarks.description: Museum housed in Winter Palace
landmarks.significance: Second-largest art museum. 3 million items.

landmarks.name: Brandenburg Gate
landmarks.description: 18th-century neoclassical monument
landmarks.significance: Symbol of German unity. Stood by Berlin Wall.

landmarks.name: Reichstag Building
landmarks.description: German parliament with glass dome
landmarks.significance: Norman Foster's dome symbolizes transparency.

landmarks.name: Cliffs of Moher
landmarks.description: Sea cliffs stretching 14 kilometers
landmarks.significance: One of Ireland's most visited attractions.

landmarks.name: Matterhorn
landmarks.description: Mountain with near-symmetrical pyramidal peak
landmarks.significance: One of most photographed mountains. Inspired Toblerone logo.

landmarks.name: Tikal
landmarks.description: Ancient Maya city with temples in rainforest
landmarks.significance: Major Maya center. Largest excavated site in Americas.

landmarks.name: Iguazu Falls
landmarks.description: 275 individual waterfalls
landmarks.significance: Eleanor Roosevelt: 'Poor Niagara' upon seeing them.

landmarks.name: Galápagos Islands
landmarks.description: Volcanic archipelago with unique wildlife
landmarks.significance: Inspired Darwin's theory of evolution. UNESCO World Heritage.

landmarks.name: Serengeti
landmarks.description: Vast ecosystem known for wildlife migration
landmarks.significance: Greatest wildlife spectacle. UNESCO World Heritage.

landmarks.name: Amazon Rainforest
landmarks.description: Largest tropical rainforest in world
landmarks.significance: Lungs of the Earth. Biodiversity hotspot.

landmarks.name: Great Barrier Reef
landmarks.description: Largest coral reef system in world
landmarks.significance: Visible from space. UNESCO World Heritage.

landmarks.name: Northern Lights
landmarks.description: Natural light display in polar regions
landmarks.significance: Aurora borealis. Bucket list natural phenomenon.

landmarks.name: Venice Canals
landmarks.description: City of canals built on 118 islands
landmarks.significance: UNESCO World Heritage. Unique floating city.

landmarks.name: Angkor Thom
landmarks.description: Ancient walled city with Bayon temple
landmarks.significance: Last capital of Khmer Empire. Stone faces iconic.

landmarks.name: Tiananmen Square
landmarks.description: Large city square, one of largest in world
landmarks.significance: Historic center of Beijing. Site of major events.

landmarks.name: Red Square
landmarks.description: City square separating Kremlin from historic district
landmarks.significance: Heart of Moscow. St. Basil's and Lenin's Mausoleum here.

landmarks.name: Times Square
landmarks.description: Major commercial intersection with bright billboards
landmarks.significance: Crossroads of the World. New Year's Eve ball drop.

landmarks.name: Himeji Castle
landmarks.description: Hilltop Japanese castle complex
landmarks.significance: Most spectacular example of Japanese castle architecture.

landmarks.name: Dubai Marina
landmarks.description: Artificial canal city with skyscrapers
landmarks.significance: World's largest man-made marina. Symbol of modern Dubai.

landmarks.name: Spanish Steps
landmarks.description: Monumental stairway of 135 steps
landmarks.significance: One of most popular meeting places in Rome.

landmarks.name: Shibuya Crossing
landmarks.description: Busiest pedestrian crossing in world
landmarks.significance: Up to 3,000 people cross at once. Icon of Tokyo.

landmarks.name: Dubai Fountain
landmarks.description: Choreographed fountain system on Burj Khalifa Lake
landmarks.significance: World's largest choreographed fountain. 900 feet long.

landmarks.name: Windsor Castle
landmarks.description: Official residence of British monarch
landmarks.significance: Oldest and largest occupied castle in world. Still used by royals.

landmarks.name: Schönbrunn Palace
landmarks.description: Former imperial summer residence
landmarks.significance: UNESCO World Heritage. 1,441 rooms. Beautiful gardens.

landmarks.name: Alcatraz Island
landmarks.description: Former federal prison on island
landmarks.significance: Housed famous criminals. 'The Rock' is iconic.

landmarks.name: Rialto Bridge
landmarks.description: Oldest bridge across Grand Canal
landmarks.significance: Iconic Venetian landmark. Central to city's commerce.

landmarks.name: Petronas Twin Towers
landmarks.description: Twin skyscrapers, tallest twin towers in world
landmarks.significance: Icon of Malaysia. Skybridge connects towers.

landmarks.name: Marina Bay Sands
landmarks.description: Integrated resort with iconic rooftop infinity pool
landmarks.significance: Architectural marvel. Symbol of modern Singapore.

landmarks.name: Mont Blanc
landmarks.description: Highest mountain in Alps
landmarks.significance: Western Europe's highest peak. Popular mountaineering destination.

landmarks.name: Yellowstone National Park
landmarks.description: First national park, famous for geysers
landmarks.significance: Old Faithful geyser. Supervolcano beneath. UNESCO World Heritage.

landmarks.name: Yosemite National Park
landmarks.description: National park famous for granite cliffs and waterfalls
landmarks.significance: El Capitan, Half Dome. UNESCO World Heritage.

landmarks.name: Banff National Park
landmarks.description: Canada's oldest national park in Rockies
landmarks.significance: Stunning mountain scenery. Lake Louise is iconic.

landmarks.name: Table Mountain
landmarks.description: Flat-topped mountain overlooking Cape Town
landmarks.significance: One of New 7 Wonders of Nature. Cable car to summit.

landmarks.name: Angel Falls
landmarks.description: World's highest uninterrupted waterfall
landmarks.significance: 15 times higher than Niagara. Named after aviator Jimmie Angel.

landmarks.name: Bagan Temples
landmarks.description: Ancient city with over 2,000 Buddhist temples
landmarks.significance: Largest concentration of temples in world. UNESCO World Heritage.
